name: Crisp & Savory Truffle Sea Salt Popcorn
description: Indulge your senses with our Crisp & Savory Truffle Sea Salt Popcorn, crafted for the discerning snack lover. Each fluffy kernel is air-popped and lightly tossed with real Italian black truffle oil, then finished with a delicate sprinkle of hand-harvested sea salt. The result is an irresistible blend of earthy umami and satisfying crunch, perfect for movie nights, parties, or a luxurious snack break. No artificial flavors or preservatives—just authentic gourmet taste in every bite.

attributes.ingredients: Non-GMO popcorn, black truffle oil, sea salt, sunflower oil
